column2: We can build Infantry, Cavalry and level 1 Fortresses.
We can now build level 2 Fortresses.
We can now assault besieged Fortresses.
We will be much more efficient in combat.
We can now build level 3 Fortresses.
We will be much more efficient in combat.
We can now build Weapon Manufactories and we will be much more efficient in combat.
We can now build level 4 Fortresses.
We can now build level 5 Fortresses and we will be much more efficient in combat.
We can now explore with all armies.
We will be much more efficient in combat.
We can now build Conscription Centers and level 6 Fortresses.
We will be much more efficient in combat and sieges will be faster.

Level 0: Allows Infantry, Cavalry and level 1 Fortresses. 
Level 2: Allows level 2 Fortresses. 
Level 5: Allows Assaults. 
Level 7: Allows Artillery. 
Level 9: Arquebus Armament (Improved CRT). 
Level 11: Allows level 3 Fortresses. 
Level 14: Musket Armament (Improved CRT). 
Level 18: Military-Industrial Complex (Allows Weapons Manufactories and Improved CRT). 
Level 21: Allows level 4 Fortresses. 
Level 26: Professional Armies (Allows level 5 Fortresses and Improved CRT). 
Level 31: Military Entrepreneurs (Allows exploration with all armies). 
Level 35: Maneuver Operations (Improved CRT). 
Level 41: Demographic Expansion (Allows Conscription Centers and level 6 Fortresses). 
Level 51: Levée en Masse (Allows faster sieges and Improved CRT).
Allows Warships, Galleys and naval troop transportation.
Galleon Shiptype (Improved Morale and Wind Gauge)
Naval Entrepreneurs (Allows exploration with all fleets)
Vaisseaux Shiptype (Improved Morale and Wind Gauge)
Naval Supply System (Cancels effect of naval attrition)
Triple Decker Shiptype (Improved Morale and Wind Gauge)

Level 0: Allows Warships, Galleys and naval troop transportation. 
Level 4: Allows Transport ships. 
Level 9: Bronze Cannon Armament (Improved CRT). 
Level 11: Great Royal Wharf (Allows Shipyards). 
Level 16: Military-Mercantile Complex (Allows Naval Equipment Manufactories). 
Level 17: Galleon Shiptype (Improved Morale and Wind Gauge). 
Level 18: Navigation Instruments (Increase sightrange at sea). 
Level 21: Iron Cannon Armament (Improved CRT). 
Level 26: Professional Navy (Improved CRT). 
Level 27: Naval Entrepreneurs (Allows exploration with all fleets). 
Level 31: Vaisseaux Shiptype (Improved Morale and Wind Gauge). 
Level 38: Sturdier Hulls (Cancels effect of Storms). 
Level 41: Naval Supply System (Cancels effect of naval attrition). 
Level 43: Straightbore Armament (Improved CRT). 
Level 49: Triple Decker Shiptype (Improved Morale and Wind Gauge). 
Level 51: Carronade Armament (Improved CRT).
Our Bailiffs can now be promoted to Tax collectors.
We can now build Fine Arts Academies.
Our Legal counsels can now be promoted to Chief judges.
Our Mayors can now be promoted to Governors.
We can now build Goods Manufactories.

Level 0: Allows Colonists. 
Level 1: Bailiffs can be promoted to Tax collectors. 
Level 2: Allows Fine Arts Academies. 
Level 3: Allows Refineries. 
Level 4: Legal counsels can be promoted to Chief judges. 
Level 5: Mayors can be promoted to Governors. 
Level 6: Allows Goods Manufactories.
We cannot yet perform any actions associated with trade.
We can now initiate Trade Embargo.

Level 1: Allows Merchants. 
Level 2: Allows Tradingposts. 
Level 3: Allows Monopolies. 
Level 4: Allows Trade Embargos.
Our Stability affects a lot of things -- for example: province tax incomes, province revolt risk, city growth rates, and the number of Merchants we get each year.
